segments.text: Excuse me , sir . I can't find my baggage . Here is my claim tag .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry , madam . Can you make a description of your baggage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One is a small-size Nike in red and the other is a big one in black . The two are tied together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . We will make an announcement for you . Please leave your telephone number , we will call your as soon as we have your baggage .
segments.speaker: S2
